text:
Hi Rebecca, here are some links for free softwares in any kind, podcasts about our industry(below the page of sec link) and some short animations. Enjoy in your isolation time!
<https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/19fL3JD0v-AfuTdAdY9r4mlxb2OyUZZvx8lW31VE9Q2A/htmlview?fbclid=IwAR0kgA84_yT5TrbNmSCK2rHcYd9yyB8cmuBzYrpaki-k0oQFhu9-V2Udhts#>
<https://www.animatedwomenuk.com/awuk-ed-resources/>
<https://www.nfb.ca/animation/>

attachments.title: AWUK-Ed Resources - Animated Women UK
attachments.text: Inspirational reading and listening materials endorsed by industry professionals. If you have a resource you would like to recommend, please contact <mailto:education@animatedwomenuk.com|education@animatedwomenuk.com>
attachments.fallback: Animated Women UK: AWUK-Ed Resources - Animated Women UK

attachments.title: National Film Board of Canada
attachments.text: Explore the NFBâ€™s vast animated film collection by director or via curated features and watch new, timely and award-winning Canadian animation online.
